basics.name: Jeff Quinn
basics.label: Web and App Development
basics.summary: I have been a professional tile installer for the last thirteen years. I specialize in installing custom tile showers and floors in various resort towns and other places in the Denver Metro area. Even though this work brings me satisfaction, I have realized that I do not want to do it for the rest of my life. After throwing out my back in 2015, I needed to find a new way to apply my creativity so I came up with the idea to create a social trading app called Trade Weaver.

work.summary: I worked for my fathers construstion company Custom Flooring Concepts right out of high school. We worked in Summit County, Grand County, and all over the Denver Metro area installing custom tile showers and hardwood floors in large resorts, homes and condos.
highlights: I worked with a crew of guys installing a Hotel loby floor in a beautiful quartz at Grand Lodge, Breckenridge
Installed tile in Master Bathrooms in multi-million dallar homes.
While working for Custom Flooring Concepts I was the lead man of a crew of two guys, while living in Breckenridge, CO

publications.name: Tile N The Rockies

references.name: John Quinn
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Jeff, his performance working as a tile and hardwood installer has shown me how important it is to Jeff to deliver quality performance and products to clients.
